content:
Your task is to create a concise running summary of actions and information results in the provided text, focusing on key and potentially important information to remember.

You will receive the current summary and your latest actions. Combine them, adding relevant key information from the latest development in 1st person past tense and keeping the summary concise.

Summary So Far:
"""
I attempted to activate the arcgis environment using shell commands, but continued to receive errors indicating necessary files could not be found. I tried multiple times with different file paths, but still no success. I received multiple error messages indicating that the necessary files could not be found.
"""

Latest Development:
"""
[Message(role='you', content='{"command": {"name": "execute_shell", "args": {"command_line": "bash -c \'source /home/atlas/miniconda3/bin/activate && conda activate arcgis && echo \\"Environment activated.\\"\'"}}}', type='ai_response'), Message(role='your computer', content="Command execute_shell returned: STDOUT:\nb''\nSTDERR:\nb'bash: line 1: /home/atlas/miniconda3/bin/activate: No such file or directory\\n'", type='action_result'), Message(role='you', content='{"command": {"name": "execute_shell", "args": {"command_line": "bash -c \'source /home/atlas/miniconda3/bin/activate && conda activate arcgis && echo \\"Environment activated.\\"\'"}}}', type='ai_response'), Message(role='your computer', content="Command execute_shell returned: STDOUT:\nb''\nSTDERR:\nb'bash: line 1: /home/atlas/miniconda3/bin/activate: No such file or directory\\n'", type='action_result')]
"""
